name: LUNA 4 go Facial Cleansing & Massaging Device
categories: Skincare, High Tech Tools, Facial Cleansing Brushes
about: What it is:A travel-friendly tool that lifts away 99.5% of dirt and oil with a one-minute cleanse and a firming facial massage that leaves skin looking smoother..What Else You Need to Know:The LUNA 4 go is made of ultra-hygienic silicone touchpoints that are 35x more hygienic than nylon bristles, with eight manually adjustable T-Sonic intensities and firming massage that increase microcirculation. No additional brush heads are needed. It is USB rechargeable, up to 300 uses per charge, and has a low-battery indicator..Clinical Results:Participants in a 28-day consumer trial reported the following benefits:
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Unlock by holding down the + and - buttons together for 3 seconds. The light will flash to indicate your device is unlocked..-Dampen your face and apply your regular face cleanser. Then wet LUNA 4 go..-Press the universal button to turn on your device. You can adjust the intensity of the T-Sonic massage with the + and - buttons. .-Glide the device in circular motions over your face and neck..-Press the universal button to turn off your device, or it will automatically turn off after 1 minute. Then rinse face/neck and device.

reviews.review_text: I love my Luna 4 Go, and the color matches perfectly my style. This small but mighty devices gives me the best cleanse and leaves my skin polished and clear. I take it with me every time I travel and love the fact that I can charge it if I need to while on the go. Plus it has a dual function as the back of the device can be used as a massager to take care of those fine lines we all want to get rid of!
